remarks: Define the falling factorial function.  This is the function ` ( A x. ( A - 1 ) x. ... ( A - N ) ) ` for complex ` A ` and nonnegative integers ` N ` .  (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 5-Jan-2018.)
statement:
df-fallfac $p |- FallFac = ( x e. CC , n e. NN0 |-> prod_ k e. ( 0 ... ( n - 1 ) ) ( x - k ) ) $.
$d k n x $.
